name: Lost 13
description:
Lost 13 is a survival game based on the real life mission of Apollo 13!

Story: When the spark that caused a explosion in the service module happened on Apollo 13. It also destroyed the radio, ending communication with Apollo 13 to Mission Control. So now the crew must make their way home by themselves with the resources available on board.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: To Click Buttons 

Mouse: To move the Pointer around.

Credits:

Nicholas Walton: Design, Art and Programming.

Clickteam: SFX
